name: Reality Bites
description:
Team Name: Two Cats

Team Memebers: Just me

Reality Bites is short game made for the 2018 Epic MegaJam. You play as a squirrel named 'Reality' and this would have been a much better joke had 7 days not pass by so quickly.

Gameplay Instructions

Controls - Left and Right arrow key to move the bull left and right.

Goal is to not run into anything and make it to the end of the level.

What platform is your game built for? Windows

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.
Used Simple Farm asset pack by Synty Studios: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/simple-farm

Background music was by Alex McCulloch: https://opengameart.org/content/richer
